english.segment1: Inwardly, I. See your smile. And I reach for, I reach for it. 'Cause I know it's all gonna be ok. Okay..
english.segment2: It's all gonna be okay, okay, OK. That is why I always say. It's all gonna be OK
english.segment3: I want to, Cover you with presents. But my love is all I have. So take me, take me now. 'Cause I know you'll not abandon me. You will complete what's begun in me
english.segment4: It's all gonna be okay, okay, OK. That is why I always say. It's all gonna be okay now. It's all gonna be OKBMI
english.segment5: As I, Come closer now. Hold me. And wipe away my tears. Hold me..Oh
english.segment6: It's all gonna be okay, okay, OK. That is why I always say. It's OK.
